extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A Grade of C+ in 6.0 units from HIST 300-329 and registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.

basic.description: Theoretical and methodological approaches to the study of diaspora, and the social and cultural history of diasporic communities in the early modern and modern world. Labour, trade and migration; race, religion and identity; tensions between national, imperial and diasporic formations are explored with a focus on a specific historical example.
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: Themes in Diaspora History
